original_text: Aaron had killed a bull and a goat. He took their blood into the Most Holy Place to make atonement. Someone must carry their dead bodies outside the camp. He must burn them. That man must burn the skin, the meat and the inside parts.
korean_text: 속죄제 수송아지와 속죄제 염소의 피를 성소로 들여다가 속죄하였은즉 그 가죽과 고기와 똥을 밖으로 내다가 불사를 것이요

sentences.original_text: Aaron had killed a bull and a goat
He took their blood into the Most Holy Place
Someone must carry their dead bodies outside the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 누군가는 그들의 죽은 몸을 진 밖으로 운반해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: That man must burn the skin
the meat and the inside parts
